channel.title: Gencon on Hudson Jameson’s Website and Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gencon on Hudson Jameson’s Website and Blog

item.title: Gencon, Blockchains, and the One Shot Podcast Network
item.description: This past weekend I attended my first Gencon gaming convention. It is the largest tabletop-game convention in North America (70,000+ people). I normally have Ethereum and other blockchain related things consume my life, but a few days a week I meet with friends and play tabletop-RPGs like Dungeons and Dragons (5e), 7th Sea, Deadlands, and Star Wars: Edge of the Empire. This blog entry primarily describes the things I’ve learned from the folks at the One Shot Podcast Network and how I plan to apply that to what I’m doing. It also describes a way that blockchain technology can help content creators who utilize traditional crowdfunding platforms.
